alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Fauquier; Frederick; Loudoun; Warren (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 3:22PM EDT until July 18 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM EDT FOR WEST CENTRAL LOUDOUN COUNTY IN NORTHERN VIRGINIA...SOUTH CENTRAL FREDERICK...WARREN...SOUTHERN CLARKE COUNTIES IN NORTHWESTERN VIRGINIA AND NORTHWESTERN FAUQUIER COUNTIES IN NORTHERN VIRGINIA... At 321 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Front Royal, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. Locations impacted include... Front Royal, Delaplane, Linden, Chester Gap, Boyce, Howellsville, White Post, Riverton, Reliance, Briggs, Rectortown, Karo, Blue Mountain, Millwood, Upperville, Nineveh, Markham, Bethel, Cedarville and Paris. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
